{{cpp/title| wcscat}}
{{cpp/string/wide/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cwchar|
wchar_t* wcscat( wchar_t* dest, const wchar_t* src );
}}

Appends a copy of the wide string pointed to by {{c|src}} to the end of the wide string pointed to by {{c|dest}}. The wide character {{c|src[0]}} replaces the null terminator at the end of {{c|dest}}. The resulting wide string is null-terminated.

The behavior is undefined if the destination array is not large enough for the contents of both {{c|src}} and {{c|dest}} and the terminating null wide character.

The behavior is undefined if the strings overlap. 

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|dest|pointer to the null-terminated wide string to append to}}
{{par|src|pointer to the null-terminated wide string to copy from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Returns a copy of {{c|dest}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cwchar&gt; 
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main(void) 
{
    wchar_t str[50] = L"Земля, прощай.";
    std::wcscat(str, L" ");
    std::wcscat(str, L"В добрый путь.");
    
    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.utf8");
    std::wcout.imbue(std::locale("en_US.utf8"));
    std::wcout &lt;&lt; str &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
Земля, прощай. В добрый путь.
}}
